General.Name: Sejal Glass Limited
General.Description: Sejal Glass Limited manufactures and sells value added glass in India and internationally. It offers solid, kool, tone, fort, armor, decor, fireban, lunaro, patterned, clear, extra clear, body tinted, solar reflective, and pyrolytic or soft coated glass products. The company was formerly known as Sezal Glass Limited and changed its name to Sejal Glass Limited in March 2014. Sejal Glass Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Mumbai, India. Sejal Glass Limited is in the Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process as per the provisions of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016.
